Elecktra/Attilla/Luzbel::

The under water cannon shot against Slayer (25 times), Elecktra 
appeared in robot mode(She had used other place to leave the base)and 
she had in her a sort of staff. She pressed a button and it became a 
trident, she shot 25 discharges of energy against Slayer.

Attill and Luzbel transformed to beast mode (Two dragons with wings)
and went to underwater, trying to capture Slayer.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Yup, its legal.
> 
> ::Slayer::
> 
> Slayer dove into the water, a shot hitting his shoulder blade and 
> several more hitting his armored back, but most of them missing. He 
> swears as a missile hits him, sending him out of control and badly 
> denting his war suit. When he regains balance underwater, one of 
his 
> missile launchers was no longer functional.
> 
> Slayer aims the other missile launcher at the door to the tunnel 
that 
> Prebon had been taken two, firing two missiles.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > OOC:is it legal that every bot shot 25 times in the same post?
> > 
> > Luzbel/Attila/Kali/Shiva/Bat-probes/Black fortress's defences::
> > 
> > Luzbel and Attila avoided the shot and shot against Iguanus (25 
> > shots) while Kali and Shivah did the same against Slayer (two of 
> them 
> > are missile-signatures, 25 hots)
> > 
> > Bat-probes and Fortress did the same.
